name: part_009
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア4周年記念LIVE】平成初期アニソン祭り【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [7lJ5kdZGFgk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare and Shirogane Noel performing the song 'Agape'.
A cinematic transition to a church setting with stained glass windows.
Shiranui Flare performing 'Yuuki no Kane ~Harete Hallelujah II~' solo in a church.
scenes.song_name: 勇気の鐘 〜晴れてハレルヤII〜

subtitles.original: Would you come if you in my life
subtitles.english: Would you come if you in my life

subtitles.original: どこにいたって聞こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear you no matter where you are

subtitles.original: 君がくれるアガペー
subtitles.english: The agape that you give me

subtitles.original: 力の限り
subtitles.english: With all my might

subtitles.english: Would you come if you in my life

subtitles.original: どこにいたって聞こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear you no matter where you are

subtitles.english: The agape that you give me

subtitles.english: With all my might

subtitles.original: Would you come if you in my life
subtitles.english: Would you come if you in my life

subtitles.original: どこにいたって聞こえる
subtitles.english: I can hear you no matter where you are

subtitles.original: 君がくれるアガペー
subtitles.english: The agape that you give me

subtitles.original: 力の限り
subtitles.english: With all my might

subtitles.original: Ah——
subtitles.english: Ah——

subtitles.original: 勇気の鐘 〜晴れてハレルヤII〜
subtitles.english: The Bell of Courage ~Sunny Hallelujah II~

subtitles.original: 作詞：西東レモン / 奥井亜紀 作曲：奥井亜紀
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Lemon Saito / Aki Okui Composition: Aki Okui

subtitles.original: おめでとう
subtitles.english: Congratulations

subtitles.original: 笑顔がゆれて
subtitles.english: With swaying smiles

subtitles.original: ゆるやかに
subtitles.english: Gently

subtitles.original: 流れる奏鳴曲(ソナタ)
subtitles.english: The sonata flows

subtitles.original: ふたりとも ずいぶん
subtitles.english: The two of you

subtitles.original: 大人に見えるよ
subtitles.english: look quite like adults

subtitles.original: 長いこと 友達同士
subtitles.english: We've been friends for a long time

subtitles.original: 何回も ケンカしてたね
subtitles.english: We fought so many times, didn't we?

subtitles.original: 気がつけば ふたり
subtitles.english: Before we knew it,

subtitles.original: 想い出が重なる
subtitles.english: our memories overlapped

subtitles.original: 男とか 女とかじゃなく
subtitles.english: Not as a man or a woman,

subtitles.original: 何でも話せるふたりだったね
subtitles.english: we were two people who could talk about anything

subtitles.original: 短いようで長い道を
subtitles.english: On this road that seems short yet long,

subtitles.original: 旅してふたりここに立ってる
subtitles.english: we've traveled and now stand here together

subtitles.original: 高らかに鳴り響く鐘の音は
subtitles.english: The sound of the bell ringing loudly

subtitles.original: 晴れやかな今日がゴールじゃなくて
subtitles.english: means today's clear sky isn't the goal

subtitles.original: お互いの胸の奥 響きあう
subtitles.english: It resonates deep within our hearts

subtitles.original: これからも続く長い旅をつげる
subtitles.english: Heralding the long journey that continues

subtitles.original: 勇気の鐘
subtitles.english: The bell of courage

subtitles.original: 夢をみる ふたりいっしょに
subtitles.english: We dream together

subtitles.original: ひとりでは たどりつけない
subtitles.english: Somewhere we couldn't reach alone

subtitles.original: 邪魔なのは
subtitles.english: What gets in the way

subtitles.original: 後悔とうすいプライド
subtitles.english: is regret and shallow pride

subtitles.original: 彼の目に
subtitles.english: In his eyes,

subtitles.original: 汗がにじんで
subtitles.english: sweat wells up

subtitles.original: うつむいて弱音吐くなら
subtitles.english: and if he hangs his head in weakness

subtitles.original: その頬を 泣いてでも
subtitles.english: Even if you're crying,

subtitles.original: たたいてあげて
subtitles.english: give those cheeks a slap

subtitles.original: 瞬間だけの なぐさめなんて
subtitles.english: Comfort that's only for a moment

subtitles.original: 中途半端な優しさに似てる
subtitles.english: is like half-hearted kindness

subtitles.original: はるか彼方に昇る太陽
subtitles.english: The sun rising in the far distance—

subtitles.original: 顔をあげてなきゃ瞳がくもる
subtitles.english: your eyes will cloud if you don't look up

subtitles.original: いつまでも 鐘の音が
subtitles.english: So the sound of the bell

subtitles.original: 響くように 深呼吸で...
subtitles.english: echoes forever, with a deep breath...
